rows.label: qst702403_msg0001
rows.name:
Man...
Those militia soldiers are
just too groovy...

rows.label: qst702403_msg0002
rows.name:
But when that Grail came raining his
stupid destruction everywhere, those
Drivers and Blades were so...so...

rows.label: qst702403_msg0004
rows.name:
Wait a second... That's...you!
You're those Drivers and Blades!

rows.label: qst702403_msg0005
rows.name:
Say what? Have I got an interest
in the militia?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0006
rows.name:
Vaguely! See, up till now I've had my
sights set on the Iiran army, took the
entrance exam three years running!

rows.label: qst702403_msg0007
rows.name:
But seeing you guys in action the other
day, it was like, man, being in the militia
could be pretty bodacious too...

rows.label: qst702403_msg0008
rows.name: So, yeah, it's a bit of a bind, frankly!

rows.label: qst702403_msg0009
rows.name:
I don't think I can give you an answer
right this second, you dig... Can I have
some time to mull it over?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0010
rows.name:
Don't worry, I know where the militia's
camped out.

rows.label: qst702403_msg0011
rows.name:
If I make my mind up to join, I'll just
head over there, yeah? Cool?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0101
rows.name:
Uhhh... Do I wait another year and take
the army entrance exams again...?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0102
rows.name:
Or do I pack my bags and enlist with
the resistance ASAP...?

rows.label: qst702403_msg0103
rows.name:
Uhhh... Lemme tell ya, there's no
easy answers here...

rows.label: qst702403_msg0104
rows.name:
If I decide in favor of the militia, I'll
head for the camp straight away.
I just need a little more time to think...
